column4: Okay great. That worked for the driver, Nvidia x config says it's using it, shows info :D Awesome....
Now...sound....I've got an Asus A8N32 SLI Deluxe board (old system, I know) with onboard realtek AC97 audio. Ubuntu 11.04, fresh install. Audio just doesn't work--period.
Speakers work, volume's up, it's unmuted.
